name: Kampfisk War
description:
Kampfisk War

It all begins in Kampfisk in 1376. In this coastal village, the inhabitants have taken the habit, following the black plague, of disposing of bodies and waste in the nearby ocean. What they didn't know was that a kingdom populated by fish-men lay below. One day this peaceful kingdom sent an emissary to Kampfisk to make contact, but the humans mistook him for a monster and burned him alive. As a result, the fish-men declared war on Kampfisk.

How to play ?
  • Move : ZQSD / Left stick
  • Attack : Mouse left / X
  • Special Attack : Mouse right / A
  • Recruit allies : A / Y
  • Heal : E / B
Development team :
  • Game Design : Luca Tramontana
  • Graphics : Benjamin Nafir & Luca Tramontana
  • Programming & Sound Design : Timothée Fageot
